title: Body In Balance Acupuncture | U District Seattle
author: DEI Creative; WA; Sandra Broberg
description: Treat your whole body and anything that ails you with acupuncture services through Body in Balance Acupuncture.
cleaned_text: Body in Balance Acupuncture Women Owned Business Sandra Broberg has been providing acupuncture services in the University District since 1998. She received her Master of Acupuncture (MAc) and Masters of Chinese Herbology from the Northwest Institute of Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine (NIAOM). She is a Licensed Acupuncturist (LAc) and an East Asian Medicine Practitioner (EAMP) in Washington State and is Nationally Board Certified in Acupuncture. Sandra received her undergraduate degree in Chemical Engineering from the University of Minnesota. She worked in environmental consulting for several years prior to becoming an acupuncturist. With a strong background in science, she integrates Western and Eastern modalities of healing. She regularly pursues a wide range of continuing educational courses so she can bring the broadest skill set to those who visit her clinic. Sandra's patients consistently share their appreciation of the effective results her treatments generate, as well as her sincere empathy, deep presence, calming and confident bedside manner, and professionalism.
